name: Lost in fantasy
description:
You are in a bright fantasy world! Your goal is to survive in it at any cost! Create your character, equip it with the necessary weapons and go to battle! Go to a wonderful world, explore it, and most importantly, beware of dangerous enemies!

Lost in fantasy is a 2D platformer with RPG elements. You will go through different levels as you progress through the story of the game!

In the game you will find many levels and different weapons! Various enemies and much more!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Lots of levels
- Nice soundtrack
